en: He didn't come today, he came yesterday.
He didn't come today, he came yesterday.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n te ne ńzsé kà à ge tó wó wɔ́.
en: I don't know if he's going to come.
He did not eat because of the illness.

ngiemboon: Pi pfɛ̌ mmó ńdʉʼʉ lénú ntse káa?
en: You ate and refused to drink water, right?

ngiemboon: Múɔ kaa pfɛ́ɛ tsɔ́ mmó wɔ́.
en: The child did not eat anything.
k. construction implement for a straw hut

ngiemboon: Affo nkáb yɔɔn síi lê kâb.
en: This silver note is very clean.

ngiemboon: Kàba lejÿɔ́ʼ gẅie ɔ̀ maʼa ngʉ̀a ngʉa aa we kɔ́?
en: That wink you give all the time, why is that?
k. potatoes mixed with vegetables dish
leftover corn couscous grilled to bottom of pot

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀cʉ̀a zyɛʼɛ́ ssé ndá lê kǎd.
en: The mouse passed very quickly  in the house.
